entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pasting into a raw string literal should ensure things stay parseable. #59820
  • Typing in Razor files breaks C# incrementality resulting in high CPU & memory usage #59818
  • Add missing namespace for 'Deconstruct' methods #59817
  • Stack Trace Explorer does not work on Maui code in VS 2022 17.1 Preview 3 #59815
  • Nullability flow analysis does not work with logical OR/AND boolean operators. #59812
  • Extraneous padding is not removed when formatting string interpolations #59811
  • Cannot run tests in codespaces #59807

Closed

  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.UseCollectionInitializer.VisualBasicUseCollectionInitializerDiagnosticAnalyzer #59819
  • Source Generator AnalyzerConfigOptions delete all Property text after the first newline or semicolon #59761
  • Source Generators: Intellisense is sluggish #58008
    17.1
  • MetadataAsSource: should record types be displayed as records? #44566
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Unify our test artifacts directory to upload more stuff on failure #59822
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove inaccurate section of doc comment #59821
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust checklist for merging new compiler feature #59816
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59814
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't get nullable slot if property sub-pattern has error #59813
    Area-Compilers, 17.2
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings #59809
    Area-IDE
  • Suppress formatting with stackalloc array creations #59808
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Disallow converted string as default argument value #59806
    Area-Compilers, 17.2

Merged

  • Add GlobalOptions.SetBackgroundAnalysisScope and PythiaGlobalOptions External Access API #59794
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • Add MetadataAsSource test for records #59736
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community, 17.2.P2
  • Do not retry on Clipboard API for StackTraceExplorer #59658
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • Update source-build dependency to source-build-externals #59549
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.2.P2

Updated

  • Update config for snap #59824
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merges/main to release/dev17.2 #59823
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Create attribute default arguments during binding #59750
    Area-Compilers
  • Produce a specific error for 'enum' as constraint #59612
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/required-members #59665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Bind declarations of checked conversion operators #59740
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of a new 'lightweight' background-work-indicator that we can use in-situ in the editor. #59759
    Area-IDE
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE
  • Produce specific error for misplaced 'record' keyword #59622
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Records
  • View call hierarchy fix (#57856) #59739
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Backport "Remove handling of certain BCL binaries from our build" to 17.0 #59588
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change navigation helpers to operate in two steps. #59798
    Area-IDE
  • Push the two-step navigation system further through roslyn. #59802
    Area-IDE
  • Update go-to-def handler to support entirely async go-to-def operation. #59801
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Add basic TS LSP server #59639
    Area-IDE
  • Review feedback from #59510 #59600
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Codeaction diagnostics #59787
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Removed navigation target and navigation hint from namespaces #59793
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix IDE0051 not working when using nameof() (#54972) #59803
    Area-Analyzers, Community
